citation: Proclamation under the Greater Hobart Act 2019 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Greater Hobart Act 2019

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Greater Hobart Act 2019 fix 25 December 2019 as the day on which that Act commences.

17 December 2019

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for State Growth

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 25 December 2019

This proclamation is administered in the Department of State Growth.
